item.title: Drop instead of destroy
item.dc:creator: @bonto bonto
item.description:
@bonto wrote:

The source i’m using only offers a ‘Destroy’ option when I wish to “Drop” something onto the ground. How would I go about making it so that I can drop any droppable item? When I click ‘drop’ on a “droppable” item, I can only destroy the object… Basically I want to drop stuff on the ground and can’t because only option is destroy

Here’s some code I found in ItemDefinitions.java:

public int getArchiveId() {
return getId() >>> 8;
}

public int getFileId() {
	return 0xff & getId();
}

public boolean isDestroyItem() {
	if (inventoryOptions == null)
		return false;
	for (String option : inventoryOptions) {
		if (option == null)
			continue;
		if (option.equalsIgnoreCase("destroy"))
			return true;
	}
	return false;
}

Read full topic
